name: Chess Variants - Omnichess
description:
Omnichess is the game that allows you to design and play your very own chess variants! With AI and online play there are a huge variety of options including:

👫 2 - 8 players. All against all or team based play.

⭐ Square or hexagonal tiled boards with a board customiser that allows you to choose the size and disable tiles allowing the creation of novel board shapes.

🥇 Win conditions including Checkmate, Play for points, Tile capture, and Annihilation.

♟ Fun rule alterations like enabling en passant on bishops or castling on any pair of pieces!

👾 Define how a piece moves and choose from over 40 piece icons

🕓 Asymmetric move timers. Give yourself extra move time against a more experienced player to even the odds
